name: My cat friend!
description:
Your new cat friend is here! Yay!
I've been thinking about how to make more systems-based bitsy games using the dialog system, which inspired this lil experiment. I might give it some updates soon to make it a bit more, you know, fun.

  • Adam  Ledoux made Bitsy, which is great
  • Eeve somepx made the title and option fonts ("smart" and "look" respectively)
  • AYolland made the dialog font and also Borksy, a very useful tool
  • Synth Ruiner made image-to-bitsy, which let me make the cat all cute
  • Sean Leblanc and Mildmojo made some neat hacks
